title: Theoretical Fishsticks
description: Meet Ron Ungary. He is a solitary man with an exceptionally high IQ. While his social skills may be lacking, his two best friends continually attempt to land him in a relationship. The week before Christmas, the three friends gather at Ronâ€™s house for another in an endless series of uneventful blind dates. However, this new prospect may not be all that she seems.With all the requisite techno-babble and gratuitous cleavage, this will be a night that Ron never forgets.
author: Sam Lang
